content: How do I avoid altitude sickness in Peru?

Altitude sickness in Peru can be caused by a combination of factors, including the lack of sleep, poor nutrition, and high altitude. To avoid altitude sickness, it is important to take precautions such as taking a warm bath or shower before going to bed.
